name: hedonically
content:

in a way that is connected with feelings of pleasure: Merchandisers know that something in our brains is hedonically stimulated whenever we buy something new and shiny. Many addictions centre around hedonically-driven activities such as drug use and gambling. Related word
hedonic
More examplesFewer examplesThe salty snacks are made to be hedonically pleasing, which is why you are compelled to keep eating them. We were hedonically motivated to finish the job and to bask again in that satisfying feeling of accomplishment.
